channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Le HDD n’est pas mort : l’arme secrète de Western Digital pour multiplier par 8 la vitesse de vos disques durs
item.description: Western Digital n'en a pas terminé avec les disques durs HDD. Le fabricant dévoile deux technologies pour les remettre sur le devant de la scène.

item.title: Watched the Fallout season 2 finale? Here are 3 more dystopian Prime Video shows to stream next
item.description: Fallout might be over for now, but there's lots of other great dystopian TV to watch on Prime Video.

item.title: « Claude restera sans publicité » : Anthropic se moque des pubs dans ChatGPT
item.description: Anthropic lance une offensive publicitaire pour faire connaitre son chatbot Claude. Et pour faire passer son message, quoi de mieux que de se moquer de la concurrence : la start-up a en effet décidé de s'amuser aux dépens d'OpenAI qui a annoncé l'arrivée prochaine de la publicité dans ChatGPT.

item.title: Spotify launches offline lyrics, translations, and lyric previews
item.description: On Wednesday, Spotify announced a few new lyrics features aiming to make it easier to understand and access song lyrics, including translations, previews, and offline lyrics. Lyric translations were originally introduced in 2022, but have only been available in specific markets so far. Now, they're rolling out worldwide to both free and premium Spotify users, […]...

item.title: Apple’s Vision Pro Could Not Provide Me the (Fake) Arcade of My Dreams
item.description: Apple Arcade app Retrocade won't replace the basement arcade-shaped hole in your heart.

item.title: Apple AirTag (2026) review: Simply better
item.description: It’s hard to tell the difference between Apple’s second-generation AirTag and the almost-five-year-old original just by looking at them. In fact, the only way to tell is the many scratches on my old tracker, picked up from all those years attached to my keyring, living in my pocket. While the price is still $29, Apple’s latest tracker packs some core upgrades. The new AirTag has a second-generation ultra-wideband (UWB) chip that extends its Precise Finding range up to 50 percent, though it requires an iPhone 15 or newer to do so. It’s also apparently 50 percent louder and has a new, higher-pi...

item.title: « Aucune démocratie n’oserait faire ça » : pourquoi les politiques français se trompent en ciblant les VPN
item.description: Les VPN sont-ils encore bienvenus en France ? Les dernières offensives contre les fournisseurs présagent un avenir sombre pour la protection de la vie privée en ligne. Une stratégie irréfléchie, inutile, voire dangereuse, mais ô combien plus facile que de prendre à bras-le-corps tous ces problèmes dont sont accusés les VPN.

item.title: Get a complete home office PC for under $500 with this Lenovo 24-inch All-in-One — save $300 on a space-saving desktop
item.description: The Lenovo 24-inch all-in-one desktop comes with 16GB of DDR4 RAM, fast SSD storage, and a clean, space-saving design, for under $500.

item.title: Nioh 3 : voici les configurations sur PC, à quoi s’attendre ?
item.description: Le troisième opus de la série de jeux Nioh sort très -très - bientôt. Quelles sont les configurations attendues pour pouvoir en profiter sur PC ?

item.title: Nintendo's first Direct showcase of 2026 is scheduled for February 5
item.description: Nintendo has lined up its first showcase of the year. The next Nintendo Direct is taking place on February 5 at 9AM ET, the company has announced. It will run for around 30 minutes.As previous reports suggested, it will focus on third-party titles from partners instead of first-party games from Nintendo itself. So if you were hoping for new Mario or Zelda announcements, that may not happen during this event. Still, you can expect to hear about new games that are coming to Switch and Switch 2. You can tune into the Direct via the YouTube video embedded above. FromSoftware’s The Duskbloods, a Ni...

item.title: Uber appoints new CFO as its AV plans accelerate
item.description: Uber is promoting Balaji Krishnamurthy, its VP of strategic finance and investor relations, to be its CFO, replacing its current finance chief Prashanth Mahendra-Rajah.

item.title: Fraude à la carte grise : des hackers ont créé des milliers de faux certificats d’immatriculation
item.description: En France, un trou béant dans le système des cartes grises est à l'origine d'une fraude massive à l'immatriculation. Des cybercriminels profitent de la situation pour détourner les comptes de garages habilités, générer des milliers de fausses cartes grises… en laissant derrière eux des professionnels ruinés par les taxes réclamées par le gouvernement....

item.title: Coinbase reveals insider breach did take place, customer info compromised
item.description: Info on roughly 30 people was exposed in a new insider incident at Coinbase.

item.title: Chipotle has a 4-part plan to boost flat sales. Part 1 is ‘the most celebrated limited-time offer in history’
item.description: In an earnings call on Tuesday, CEO Scott Boatwright said the Mexican restaurant chain will increase its ‘menu innovation cadence’ in 2026. Shares of Chipotle Mexican Grill are down over 6% in premarket trading following a relatively humdrum fourth-quarter earnings report.

item.title: Your skincare products are full of fats and oils. This startup launched a clean beauty line with ancient chemistry
item.description: Savor turns captured carbon dioxide into fats. After first making butter, the company is now entering the personal care and beauty space. Your beauty and skincare products are full of fats and oils. They’re what makes that cream so moisturizing or that emollient so good at repairing your skin barrier.

item.title: It’s Going to Take a While For ‘Pluribus’ Season 2
item.description: Plus, 'The Last of Us' finds its new Manny after Danny Ramirez's exit.

item.title: What Is RGB LED TV? Everything You Need to Know About This Next-Gen TV Tech In 2026
item.description: With incredible colors, brightness, and contrast, RGB backlighting is the technology that will drive the next 10 years of innovation in televisions and displays.

item.title: Amazon rolls out Alexa Plus nationwide and launches a new free tier
item.description: Amazon has announced that its generative AI-powered digital assistant Alexa Plus is now available to all Prime members in the US via any Alexa-enabled device, Alexa.com, and the Alexa mobile app. If you don't have Prime, you can access the assistant on a new free tier on the web and app, or pay $20 a […]

item.title: SNAK Venture Partners raises $50M fund to back vertical marketplaces
item.description: SNAK Venture Partners announced Wednesday the close of its oversubsubscribed $50 million debut fund, anchored by Pritzker Group.

item.title: Alexa+, Amazon’s AI assistant, is now available to everyone in the U.S.
item.description: Amazon opens Alexa+ to everyone in the U.S. The AI feature is free for Prime members across devices, and free for everyone on mobile and web.

item.title: Apeiron Labs gets $29M to flood the oceans with autonomous underwater robots
item.description: Most of what we know about the ocean just skims the surface, literally. We’ve gathered a large quantity of data on the oceans from satellites, but most of that is based on the top layer of water. Below that, the picture gets murkier. Buoys, ships, and some autonomous rovers have recently added some detail, but […]

item.title: Nioh 3 taking the series to an open-world format works shockingly well — thanks to that and its style-switching combat, it’s become one of the best soulslikes I’ve ever played
item.description: Nioh 3’s changes to the series’ established formula make for a fresh yet familiar feeling game, and I can’t get enough of it.

item.title: Alexa+ is now available for free to everyone in the US on Prime – but early users say you should tread carefully
item.description: Amazon is opening up the Alexa+ doors to everyone in the US, but there are tales of caution from early adopters.

item.title: What is the release date for A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms episode 4 on HBO Max?
item.description: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms' fourth episode rides forth earlier than anticipated – here's when you can watch it.

item.title: Vie numérique | Et si l’écran de votre PC pouvait s’éclater ?
item.description: On en parle beaucoup du côté de la téléphonie, mais la mode des écrans surdimensionnés a aussi conquis depuis quelques mois le marché des ordinateurs personnels. Et ce n’est pas en 2026 que ça va s’arrêter…

item.title: Ce nouveau smartphone Oppo à l’autonomie XXL vient de sortir et perd déjà 70 € de son prix
item.description: Oppo dégaine déjà de nouveaux smartphones milieu de gamme, et le Reno 15 FS mise sur une grosse batterie de 6 500 mAh pour convaincre. Mieux encore, ce dernier se trouve déjà en promo : 379 euros contre 449 euros de base.

item.title: Call of Duty : Activision s’attaque enfin aux tricheurs de la pire espèce
item.description: Activision renforce son système de détection de triche pour les utilisateurs de dispositifs tiers comme le Cronus Zen ou XIM, le dernier rempart contre les pires tricheurs de Call of Duty.

item.title: This 45W Anker Nano charger with smart display is on sale for only $30
item.description: Anker introduced a nifty little charger at CES 2026, which is a refresh of the pre-existing Nano Charger. It's already on sale for $30 on Amazon, which is a 25 percent discount. The 45W charger includes a smart display that shows real-time data like power flow, temperature and charging status. It also features "fun animations to keep things cheerful." Anker says it can recognize what's being charged and automatically adjust certain metrics to ensure a longer battery lifespan. To that end, it works with just about everything. The company advertises that this charger is a good fit for the iPhon...

item.title: Coros transforme ses montres de sport : voici toutes les nouveautés de la mise à jour de février
item.description: Coros a annoncé une mise à jour majeure de ses montres de sport et de son compteur GPS avec de nombreuses nouveautés.

item.title: Microsoft’s latest chip points to a future where laptops and phones aren’t held hostage by AI inflation
item.description: Microsoft's new AI chip shows how consumer computing devices like laptops and phones might eventually escape the AI bubble and spiraling prices.

item.title: Ce détail change tout : ce que vient de révéler le télescope James-Webb dans l’Univers primordial ne devrait pas exister !
item.description: Pour les astronomes, le télescope spatial James-Webb est un outil précieux. Il le montre une fois de plus aujourd’hui. Les dernières images qu’il a renvoyées révèlent une scène que personne ne s’attendait à voir aussi tôt dans l’histoire de notre Univers…

item.title: Cette application inédite vous permet de surveiller la santé de tous les membres de votre famille
item.description: Le fondateur de Fitbit a dévoilé son nouveau projet, l'application Luffu. Celle-ci va vous permettre de récupérer les informations médicales de toute votre famille à partir de différents appareils connectés.

item.title: Free corrige un problème technique qui touchait tous les abonnés
item.description: Free confirme que le problème qui touchait les clients de son service Free TV a été résolu. Les images étaient saccadées.

item.title: Tout ce que l’on sait sur le Pixel 10a : Google joue-t-il la sécurité ou la paresse ?
item.description: Google s’apprête à bousculer son calendrier habituel en avançant le lancement du Pixel 10a. Entre rumeurs de fiche technique recyclée et prix inchangé, voici tout ce que l'on sait sur le futur champion du milieu de gamme de Mountain View.

item.title: If a cheap soundbar is all you need, then this Samsung HW-C400 is an ideal upgrade for the Super Bowl
item.description: An attractive, well-made, and affordable soundbar

item.title: Super Bowl 2026 advertisers are paying record-breaking prices to feature these brands and celebrities
item.description: Peter Lazarus at NBCUniversal said on average ad space sold for $8 million per 30-second unit. As Super Bowl Sunday approaches, the battle off the field for advertisers to win over 120 million-plus viewers will be just as heated as the rivalry between the New England Patriots and Seattle Seahawks.Dozens of advertisers are pulling out all the stops for Super Bowl 60, airing Sunday on NBC. They’re hoping that audiences tuning in will remember their brand names as they stuff their ads with celebrities ranging from Kendall Jenner (Fanatics Sportsbook) to George Clooney (Grubhub), tried-and-true ad...

item.title: Epic admet que sa boutique de jeux est nulle et promet des améliorations
item.description: Depuis toujours, l'Epic Games Store se rêve en meilleur concurrent de Steam. Mais dans les faits, la boutique de Valve demeure toujours très loin devant n'importe quel rival, dans tous les domaines. Epic promet de faire mieux et annonce des améliorations basiques mais qui font défaut aujourd'hui.

item.title: The Best Cordless Vacuums for Your Whole House (2026)
item.description: Clean your house without the constraint of a power cord with these cordless stick vacuums.

item.title: Sonos home theater gear is on sale for up to 20 percent off right now
item.description: Like many other companies during Super Bowl season, Sonos is discounting its home theater gear. Today, you can save $130 on the Beam (Gen 2) soundbar, bringing its price down to $369. You'll also find deals on the flagship Arc Ultra Soundbar, Sonos subwoofers, and more. The Sonos Beam is the company's sub-$500 soundbar. Engadget's pick for the best midrange model, the compact speaker has impressive sound for its size. Part of that is its Dolby Atmos support. Although the soundbar lacks upward-firing speakers, it uses software tricks to compensate. Audio timing and frequency adjustments make so...

item.title: Psst! Save $379 on the Kamrui Hyper H2 mini PC with this code - it's got an Intel Core i5-14450HX with 16GB RAM, and it's nearly half-price right now
item.description: Kamrui Hyper H2 mini PC is powered by Intel’s Core i5-14450HX, paired with 16GB of DDR4 RAM and a fast 512GB NVMe SSD, and it's just $390.15.

item.title: Everyone is stealing TV
item.description: Walk the rows of the farmers market in a small, nondescript Texas town about an hour away from Austin, and you might stumble across something unexpected: In between booths selling fresh, local pickles and pies, there's a table piled high with generic-looking streaming boxes, promising free access to NFL games, UFC fights, and any cable […]

item.title: Il a travaillé pour AMD et Qualcomm : voici la recrue star d’Intel qui doit sauver sa division GPU
item.description: Où va Intel sur le plan GPU ? La question, qui se pose souvent, ne semble pas pertinente aux yeux de Lip-Bu Tan. Le dirigeant du groupe s'est montré particulièrement rassurant en la matière lors d'une intervention au Cisco AI Summit.

item.title: Un accord de libre-échange historique entre l’UE et l’Inde pourrait changer beaucoup de choses pour le vélo électrique
item.description: Il fait l'actualité de ces derniers jours : l’accord définitif entre l’Union européenne et l’Inde inclut la suppression des droits de douane pour les vélos électriques entre les deux parties, selon les informations de Bike Europe.

item.title: Stephen Colbert gleefully mocks the All American alternative Super Bowl halftime show
item.description: Stephen Colbert has poked fun at Kid Rock's "All American" alternative halftime show that's playing at the same time as Bad Bunny's Super Bowl LX halftime show.

item.title: All your Tinder questions, answered
item.description: Top Tinder questions, like whether is Tinder free, answered by Mashable.

item.title: Anthropic says ‘Claude will remain ad-free,’ unlike ChatGPT
item.description: Anthropic has announced that it won't be bringing ads to its AI chatbot Claude, in sharp contrast to confirmed plans from OpenAI to allow advertising in ChatGPT. To hammer the point home further, the company is releasing a Super Bowl commercial that makes fun of unnamed rivals adding adverts to their AI. "We want Claude […]

item.title: This 512GB Samsung P9 microSD Express card is on sale for 33 percent off
item.description: If you're looking to expand the storage on your Switch 2, the 512GB Samsung P9 microSD Express card is on sale right now for 33 percent off, marked down to $80 from $120. With component prices skyrocketing these days, it's getting increasingly rare to see good storage on sale, and 512GB for $80 is a much better deal than you'll currently find directly from Nintendo. The P9 boasts transfer speeds of up to 800MB/s, making moving games to the card that much faster. As for load times, in our testing we found that any microSD Express, the standard the Switch 2 requires, will offer roughly the same ...

item.title: Apple launches Xcode 26.3, brings even more AI power to coding on Mac
item.description: Apple ecosystem developers are now able to use agentic AI models from OpenAI and Anthropic within Xcode.

item.title: Wizards of the Coast Is Giving God’s Favorite Princess Her Own ‘Magic: The Gathering’ Secret Lair
item.description: Gale Dekarios is also here to represent 'Baldur's Gate 3' in Wizards of the Coast's 'Dungeons & Dragons'-themed superdrop.

item.title: 9 Best Outdoor Security Cameras (2026): Battery-Powered, LTE, No Subscription
item.description: These weatherproof outdoor security cams keep a watchful eye on your property while you get on with life. Our list includes battery-powered and LTE cameras that need no subscription.

item.title: Accel doubles down on Fibr AI as agents turn static websites into one-to-one experiences
item.description: Fibr AI replaces marketing agency– and engineering-heavy website personalization with autonomous systems designed for enterprise scale.

item.title: Spotify upgrades its lyrics feature with offline access, more translations
item.description: Spotify is revamping its lyrics feature, adding offline access for Premium users, global lyric translations, and a more prominent placement in the Now Playing view.

item.title: Spotify is rolling out 3 exciting new features for Lyrics, including translations, and I can’t wait to finally understand what my favorite Spanish artists have been singing about
item.description: Spotify is finally launching Lyric Translations globally, and it's also giving it a new home in the mobile app.

item.title: 'We’re building something I want for my family and your family': Fitbit co-founders are launching a new family-wide health tracking app, but we have our reservations
item.description: Fitbit co-founders are launching a family-wide health monitoring software, but we have our concerns.

item.title: A new Apple Pay scam is hitting millions – here's how to spot fake 'unusual activity' messages before it's too late
item.description: An Apple Pay scam uses urgency to panic Apple users into handing over their accounts.

item.title: Amazon retire déjà 20 % sur sa nouvelle sonnette 4K avec détection de mouvements 3D
item.description: Une image 4K, un système de détection 3D, une vision nocturne en couleur : une sonnette aussi complète demande un budget important, mais heureusement, la Ring Wired Video Doorbell Pro 3e génération, qui regroupe toutes ces fonctionnalités, perd 20 % de son prix.

item.title: The Samsung Buds 4 Pro design leaks yet again in all its glory — but I tested the Buds 3 Pro, and I hope Samsung fixes one invisible flaw
item.description: The Samsung Galaxy Buds 4 Pro have leaked, and the renders don't answer my biggest worry, which caused some Buds 4 Pro backlash.
